content: is designed flat but once you get the increase positioning down it s easy enough to adapt to round knitting and alternate gauges **note as of april 21 2012 ** i have hopefully made some tweaks to the way the instructions were written that will make it clearer to understand i have also added a chart and instructions for working this in the round 1 http //docs google com/doc docid=0afqvtiq9xbdzzghybw1toghfntvnctjjm3btea&hl=en
